channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- AddToAny Share Buttons
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- AddToAny Share Buttons

item.title: CVE-2021-24616|2024-08-03T19:35:20.230Z -- unknown -- addtoany%20share%20buttons
item.description: The AddToAny Share Buttons WordPress plugin before 1.7.48 does not escape its Image URL button setting, which could lead allow high privilege users to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed.

item.title: CVE-2021-24568|2024-08-03T19:35:20.211Z -- unknown -- addtoany%20share%20buttons
item.description: The AddToAny Share Buttons WordPress plugin before 1.7.46 does not sanitise its Sharing Header setting when outputting it in frontend pages, allowing high privilege users such as admin to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed
